trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo" /> objects that are associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo" /> asociados a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection> is a strongly-typed <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> that is used to support declarations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection> está fuertemente tipado <xref:System.Windows.FreezableCollection%601> que se usa para admitir declaraciones en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar preview.
trans-unit.target: El [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell permite un máximo de siete botones en la vista previa de la barra de tareas.

trans-unit.source: If more than seven <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection>, the additional objects are treated as overflow.
trans-unit.target: Si más de siete <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfo> se agregan objetos a la <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection>, los objetos adicionales se tratan como desbordamiento.

trans-unit.source: When a button is <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Collapsed>, it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un botón es <xref:System.Windows.Visibility.Collapsed>, no tiene ningún elemento visible y ningún espacio se reserva para él.

trans-unit.source: In this case, additional buttons from the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection> overflow are displayed.
trans-unit.target: En este botones, mayúsculas, adicionales desde la <xref:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection> desbordamiento se muestran.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shell.ThumbButtonInfoCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la colección.

trans-unit.source: The new instance of the collection.
